From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Upcoming Indian film
Sky ForceDirected bySandeep KewlaniAbhishek Anil KapurWritten bySandeep KewlaniAdditional Screenplay:Aamil Keeyan KhanAdditional Dialogues:Niren BhattAamil Keeyan KhanProduced by
Amar Kaushik
Dinesh Vijan
Jyoti Deshpande
Starring
Akshay Kumar
Veer Pahariya
Sara Ali Khan
Nimrat Kaur
CinematographySanthana Krishnan RavichandranEdited bySyed Shafqat AliProductioncompaniesJio StudiosMaddock FilmsDistributed byPVR Inox PicturesRelease date
2 October 2024 (2024-10-02)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Sky Force is an upcoming Hindi-language action-thriller film written by Sandeep Kewlani and directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and Sandeep Kewlani. It stars Akshay Kumar, Veer Pahariya, Sara Ali Khan and Nimrat Kaur.[1][2] The film is based on a true story.[3]


Cast[edit]
Akshay Kumar
Veer Pahariya
Sara Ali Khan
Nimrat Kaur
Production[edit]
The film was announced in March 2023.[4][5]  Later actor Akshay Kumar confirmed the movie on 2 October 2023, on the occasion of Gandhi Jayanti.[6][7] The film is inspired by India's retaliatory attack on Pakistan's Sargodha airbase in the Indo-Pakistani air war of 1965.[8][9]
Principal photography of the movie began in August 2023.[10][11]

Casting[edit]
Sara Ali Khan and Nimrat Kaur joined the casting in mid 2023.[12] Veer Pahariya plays the role of Squadron Leader MVC Ajjamada B. Devaiah.[13]

Filming[edit]
The film is reported to be shot in Gujarat, Punjab, Rajasthan, and Assam.[14] The team arrived in Lucknow for filming on 24 August 2023.[15][16][17] Some parts of the film shot in Sitapur of Lucknow.[18]

Release[edit]
Sky Force film is set to theatrical release on 2 October 2024.[19]
